en.description: NovelRead AI Tutor is an innovative platform that leverages AI technology to enhance the reading experience of English novels.

zh.description: 結合AI輔助閱讀英文小說，使用React框架，並搭配Gemini進行互動式學習。

en.description: Used Laravel+Apache+MySQL+PHP to help qualified caregivers or physical therapists find job opportunities on this platform, while also allowing families with care needs to quickly filter suitable personnel.

zh.description: 使用Laravel+Apache+MySQL+PHP幫助有能力的照護員or物理治療師在此平台上找到工作機會，同時也讓有照護需求的家庭快速篩選適合的人員。

en.description: Helped the Arabic Alumni Association set up a dedicated website from scratch, handling everything from choosing the template, renting the domain, to redirecting, all by myself. Additionally, I have continuously added new features, such as member registration and payment.

zh.description: 從0開始幫助阿拉伯文系友會 架設專屬會網，從挑樣板、網域租借到轉址等等，皆為一人完成。此外，後續也陸續新增功能，像是會員註冊及繳費。

en.description: Used Selenium to scrape data from the NCCU Bulletin Board and sent the results to a Heroku server. The posts were categorized into three main types: "Lost and Found," "Form Draws," and "Surplus Food." Users can now retrieve the desired posts via LINEBOT, replacing the original Facebook post search functionality.

zh.description: 利用Selenium在政大交流版進行爬蟲再將結果傳送到Heroku伺服器，並將貼文分類成「遺失物」、「表單抽獎」及「剩食」三大類。讓使用者透過LINEBOT一鍵獲取想要的貼文取代臉書原本的貼文搜尋功能。

en.description: Developed a React Native app for the Rarawa language, enabling users to easily upload Rarawa language audio via their mobile phones. The app features voice recording, vocabulary practice, and integrates various AI models to generate engaging media, aiming to promote the learning and preservation of the Rarawa language.

zh.description: 利用React Native開發一款拉阿魯哇語音APP，讓使用者能夠透過手機輕鬆上傳拉阿魯哇語言。此APP提供了語音保存、詞彙練習等功能，並結合不同的AI模型生成趣味媒體，旨在促進拉阿魯哇語言的學習與傳承。
